name: Nakajima Satoru Kanshuu: F-1 Hero 2
overview: Nakajima Satoru F-1 Hero 2 (中嶋悟監修 F-1ヒーロー2?) is a 1991 Japan-exclusive Family Computer Formula One video game developed by Human Entertainment and published by Varie. It is the sequel to Nakajima Satoru: F-1 Hero, and is based on the 1991 Formula One season. There are 16 rounds and only four cars to choose from.
